title: Escalator Cleaner D-510ES
description: This  Escalator Cleaner, D-510Es , is specifically created to keep escalators clean, safe, and running smoothly. Equipped with the most high-end brush and suction that is powerful, the machine effortlessly takes away dirt, dust, and other debris from difficult-to-reach steps and grooves, providing a comfortable ride for all passengers while reducing maintenance downtime.Small and simple to move the D-510Es is small and compact, with easy-to-use controls and a robust construction that can withstand the rigors of the demands of daily commercial usage. Its low-noise operation makes it ideal for shopping malls, crowded airports, metro stations, and commercial complexes where safety and cleanliness are paramount.
keyFeatures: High-Capacity Water Tanks – Comes with large clean and recovery tanks of 32 and 35 Liters, enabling longer cleaning sessions with fewer interruptions.
Dual Brush Cleaning System – Features front and rear rotating brushes that deliver powerful scrubbing action across every step, ensuring complete dirt removal even in grooves and edges.
Cleanse Steps with Targeted Cleaning – Brushes and suction are perfect for escalator steps and grooves.
Highly effective Dust & Cleansing Debris – Keeps escalators free from slip hazards and grime.
Lightweight and Compact – Easy to handle in tight spaces as well as on escalators moving.
Operating at a low-noise level – Reduces noise in commercial and public areas.
Ergonomic Design – Controls that are comfortable for an effortless, smooth operation.
Long-Term Construction – Made for day-to-day commercial use with heavy-duty requirements.
